name: Galaxian Racing
description:
Cool points about the game:

- Trendy and fancy gameplay and graphics.

- Training the speed of reaction and concentration

- Picking coins and boosting up to 20 spaceship models

- Developing the ability to pass many obstacles as soon as you can

Galaxian Racing is a very clear, intuitive, and still thrilling casual game with elements of racing and adventure. 

The game is perfect for both adults and kids!

Gameplay:

You finally can dissolve in the air stream and endlessly fly on your spaceship. Tap left or right to control the spaceship flight. 

Dodge obstacles, collect coins and exchange them for the new ships configurations.

Galaxian Racing is the great way to relax and relieve tension enjoying the great gameplay.
